mapper.select: SELECT id, origin_name, file_dir, file_name, content_type, file_size, reg_date, edit_date, listno FROM file WHERE listno=#{listno}
SELECT file_dir, file_name FROM file WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT concat(file_dir,'/',file_name) as image_path FROM file WHERE supno=#{supno} AND content_type LIKE ('image/%')
